title: Perplexity Campus Strategist Program 2024
snippet: Sudarshan Nambiar is a student at Purdue University studying Computer Engineering. He is a Neo scholars finalist and also a member of ML@Purdue.

title: INTERVIEW: High leverage a deterrent to rate cuts, says YES Bank's Nambiar
snippet: That India's interest rate cut cycle is likely to be shallow is almost a consensus view by now, premised on the stickiness of inflation. YES Bank's head of trading Sudarshan Nambiar adds another dimension to the discussion: the Monetary Policy Committee would be cautious in easing monetary conditions due to the high leverage in the economy.
